scripts.demo.ios: npm run preparedemo && cd demo && tns debug ios
scripts.demo.ios.device: npm run preparedemo && cd demo && tns run ios
scripts.demo.android: npm run preparedemo && cd demo && tns run android --emulator --timeout 0
scripts.demo.android.angular: npm run preparedemoangular && cd demo-angular && tns run android --emulator --timeout 0
scripts.preparedemo: npm run build && cd demo && tns plugin remove nativescript-stripe && tns plugin add .. && tns install
scripts.preparedemoangular: npm run build && cd demo-angular && tns plugin remove nativescript-stripe && tns plugin add .. && tns install
scripts.setup: npm i && cd demo && npm i && cd .. && npm run build && cd demo && tns plugin add .. && cd ..
